caption.p: Effect of experimental treatments and challenge with E. tenella on oocyst value and inhibition rate at 7 d postinoculation; R1g, R3g, and R5g are 1, 3, and 5 g RN/kg diet, respectively, Sacox: 66 mg of salinomycin/kg diet; PC and NC: basal diet with and without coccidiosis challenge, respectively. Different lowercase letters indicate significant differences.
